description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(735).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,488,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[735], 20]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 11 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 9 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 488 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 21 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
